why_it_works: Asymmetric corner creates brand thumbprint - memorable shape
Bokeh texture adds photographic warmth to flat color
Serif + italic accent creates hierarchy without multiple weights
Cream frame elevates the card - feels printed not digital
stealable_rules: Card-in-card with cream outer = instant premium feel
One sharp corner + three rounded = signature shape
Italic + color on second line = visual hook
Body text should be understated - never compete with headline
